summary: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.
cast: Lake Bell|Rob Corddry|Alexandra Holden|Eva Longoria|Ken Marino|Demetri Martin|Fred Melamed|Tig Notaro|Nick Offerman|Michaela Watkins|Geena Davis|Stephanie Allynne|Melissa Disney|Olya Milova|Corsica Wilson|Yelena Protsenko|Carly Chaikin|Janicza Bravo|Jason O'Mara|Talulah Riley|Erin Michele Soto|Mara Lane|Erinn Westbrook|Amy Vorpahl|Hidetoshi Imura|Nancy Gomez|Jaime Aymerich|Marc Graue|Kevin Rock|Joe Cipriano|Shobhit Agarwal|Don Luce|Andy Grosso|Mark Elliott|Christina Chang|Paula Sata|Don LaFontaine|Elizabeth Gesas|Carrie Martin|Nicole LaLiberte|Jonathan Peacy|Scott Campbell|Michael Burns|Brett Praise|Gareth Stehr|Daniel Abreu|Cameron Diaz|Jeff Garlin
keywords: female empowerment|voice artist|father daughter rivalry|sister sister relationship|father daughter relationship
title: La voz de una generación
